description: The Gundam Meister who pilots the heavily armed Gundam Virtue. His origins, his personal history, and even his age are a complete mystery, but he appears to be an androgynously handsome young man around the age of sixteen. He is ruthlessly loyal to Veda, the entity that controls Celestial Being, and tolerates no deviation from its plans by his unreliable comrades.
name: Tieria Erde
